snippet: Archives and pictures from some pioneers in the medium have stayed together and are headed to the National Gallery and Sotheby’s.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; archives and pictures from some pioneers in medium have stayed together and are headed to National Gallery and Sotheby’s; twelfth-century stained-glass windows from Canterbury Cathedral are shipped to J Paul Getty Museum in Los Angeles for a upcoming show; book written by tool collector David R Russell, retired British builder who lives in France, about his holdings in 2010 is now lifting their sales prices.
lead_paragraph: Archives and pictures from some pioneers in the medium have stayed together and are headed to the National Gallery and Sotheby’s.

headline.main: Works From Earliest Photographers Are on Display and on Sale
headline.print_headline:
Earliest Photographs
Go on View and on Sale
